cn.yueshutong.springbootstartercurrentlimiting.interceptor

类 CurrentInterceptorConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
      • cn.yueshutong.springbootstartercurrentlimiting.interceptor.CurrentInterceptorConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer

    @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="current.limiting",
                       name="enabled",
                       havingValue="true")
public class CurrentInterceptorConfig
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
    spring boot 1.x Interceptor
